channel.title: World Wide Wrestling: Britain Wide Jousting
channel.description:
Hear ye, hear ye: Arthur, King of the Britons, has called all of the mightiest knights from across his realms to demonstrate their prowess in a jousting tournament! The greatest jousters will win everlasting renown, but woe to the knight who turneth to treachery and foul play.
![two-knights-jousting-from-bl-harley-4205-f-14-d75ddd-1024|678x500](upload://vy5EGmQAVQmCnc56YTNIlan8pHu.jpeg)
This session is scheduled for three hours. It will be recorded and posted with players' permission.
We will be playing World Wide Wrestling, with a slight twist: instead of professional wrestlers, we will be knights in Arthurian Britain. Attendance at all sessions is encouraged but not required. You must RSVP for each session you want to attend. No prior knowledge of the system is required.
Script Change, lines and veils, and the open door policy will be in effect. This event abides by the Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy.
All-access begins 5/24 at 10 pm EDT
[date=2020-06-22 time=21:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-06-22 time=23:59:00 timezone="America/New_York"] Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M7zEfKj8SZdwy0gdqie [date=2020-06-29 time=21:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-06-29 time=23:59:00 timezone="America/New_York"] Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M7zEtQxJlQ-vbP16EuU

Hear ye, hear ye: Arthur, King of the Britons, has called all of the mightiest knights from across his realms to demonstrate their prowess in a jousting tournament! The greatest jousters will win everlasting renown, but woe to the knight who turneth to treachery and foul play.

This session is scheduled for three hours. It will be recorded and posted with players’ permission.

We will be playing World Wide Wrestling, with a slight twist: instead of professional wrestlers, we will be knights in Arthurian Britain. Attendance at all sessions is encouraged but not required. You must RSVP for each session you want to attend. No prior knowledge of the system is required.
